description: A TunnelInstallation is a permanent part of a Tunnel (inside and/or outside) which does not have the significance of a TunnelPart. In contrast to TunnelConstructiveElement, a TunnelInstallation is not essential from a structural point of view. Examples are stairs, antennas or railings.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the TunnelInstallation.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the TunnelInstallation.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the TunnelInstallation.

properties.name: lod2Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the TunnelInstallation in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the TunnelInstallation in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the TunnelInstallation in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the TunnelInstallation in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
